reviewtext: After installation two of the four fixtures did not come on after dark.After a long minute phone wait I finally spoke to a Helpline person at Heath Zenithand they assured me I would get two replacements mailed to me.I did get one replacement and have again sent a request for a second replacement.The two units that work are doing well and have no issues.I will buy a different unit next time as these obviously have a high failure rate, probablythat's why the price is so cheap.
summary: 2 out of 4 fixtures did not function and a replacement has been requested
